Title: Establishes the farm ownership succession planning program
Summary: Establishes the farm ownership succession planning program to provide farm owners with a succession planning toolkit that can be used by such farm owners who plan on selling or closing their farm.
LawCode: Add ยง323-a, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to establishing the farm ownership succession planning program (FOSPP)
